text: Celso Fredy Güity Núñez (13 July 1957 – 12 February 2021) was a Honduran football forward. He played for the national team eleven times and in the 1982 FIFA World Cup.1982 FIFA World Cup Spain - FIFA Güity played six years for Marathón and also had a season at Sula.Desafíe a Ismael - La Prensa He was born in Tegucigalpa, Honduras. Güity died on 12 February 2021 in Miami, Florida from cancer at the age of 63.Fallece en EE.UU. Celso Fredy Güity, ex mundialista con Honduras en España 82 ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Honduran footballers Category:Cancer deaths in Florida
title: Celso Güity
